title: Why Would Giuliani Say Obama Doesn't Love America?
teaser: Derek Thompson of The Atlantic takes a closer look at the former New York mayor's claim, and why he may have made it.
contentencoded:
Former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani is in the news again, after saying on Wednesday, “I do not believe, and I know this is a horrible thing to say, but I do not believe that the president loves America.”

Derek Thompson of The Atlantic joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to take a closer look at that claim, and why Giuliani may have made the statement.

Guest

  • Derek Thompson, senior editor at The Atlantic. He tweets @DKThomp.
